definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable

sentences.english: He contracted 1994 ten mus of barren mountain after the village do a smallholding .
sentences.chinese: 1994年他承包了村后十几亩荒山办起一个小农场。

sentences.english: Dalbergia sissoo can be adaptable in dry-hot valley areas.
sentences.chinese: 印度黄檀适于云南干热河谷地区的荒山造林。

sentences.english: In China even barren mountains can be turned into fertile fields.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，荒山也能变成俍田。

sentences.english: To tackle the erosion problem, a large area of suitable mountains has been reforested .
sentences.chinese: 为了解决侵蚀问题，大面积的适宜荒山已经植树造林。

sentences.english: The wild mountain scene lay spread before our hotel.
sentences.chinese: 荒山的景色展现在我们的旅馆前面。

sentences.english: Like the work "Barren Mountain", it is directly related to my mother's death.
sentences.chinese: 像“荒山”那个作品，和我母亲去世是有直接关系的。

sentences.english: Be in barren mountain, old sister-in-law and Luo Daquan vertical horse gallop, shoot hunt.
sentences.chinese: 在荒山，陈大嫂和罗大全纵马飞奔，开枪打猎。

sentences.english: It is for the first time to use wastewater irrigating barren mountain for virescence.
sentences.chinese: 用污水绿化灌溉荒山在新疆尚属首次。

sentences.english: Having searched for a long time, I finally spotted a tiger in the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 寻找了好久，我终于在荒山上看到了于菟。

sentences.english: Road cut into the barren hills which lead into Emmett.
sentences.chinese: 路切入而进入埃米特导致荒山。

sentences.english: There are lofty fells behind this village.
sentences.chinese: 这个村庄后面是高高的荒山。

sentences.english: Ishmael and Hagar were cast into the wilderness by Abraham.
sentences.chinese: 结果伊什梅尔和夏甲被亚伯拉罕丢弃在荒山野岭之中。

definition: Shulin city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
dark and uninhabited (idiom); remote and deserted/God-forsaken
lit. barren hills and wild rivers (idiom)/fig. inhospitable natural environment
